room_title: Escape room "The Vault" by PuzzleWorks in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: The guys running the place are fantastic. The Vault was a blast - plenty to do for everyone, quality puzzles/environment - we all had so much fun! Price point is very reasonable and you get a free drink next door. I highly recommend and hope to be back for another room soon.

room_title: Escape room "The Vault" by PuzzleWorks in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: I loved the Vault Room. It was very clever and well executed. I also loved the way the staff monitored our progress and provided clues. It was an awesome group activity!

room_title: Escape room "The Vault" by PuzzleWorks in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: This place is awesome! I have done a few puzzle rooms before, and this was one as good if not better! The amazing detail in The Vault, along with the fantastic clues and surprise pieces were great!Definitely go see them and help spread the word! This place is beyond well worth it! Thanks for the awesome evening, and I cannot wait to be back to try to Escape the next room! Keep up the great hard work, it's definitely noticed!!
